recipe.title: Birthday Cake In A Jar Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 teaspoon ; rainbow sprinkles, plus more for serving, optional
8 oz ; jar, microwave and oven safe ; (225 g)

steps.step: Add the angel food cake mix and yellow cake mix to a jar. Place a cupcake liner over the cake mix and add the rainbow sprinkles. Cover with the lid.
Store in the pantry for up to 3 months.

When ready to eat, remove the lid and cupcake liner with the sprinkles from the jar. Pour the water into the dry cake mix. Mix thoroughly, making sure to scrape the dry mix from the bottom of the jar.
Pour the sprinkles into the jar and gently stir to distribute, being careful not to push all of the sprinkles to the bottom.
Microwave for another 40 seconds, until cooked through.
Top with whipped cream and rainbow sprinkles, if desired.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add the angel food cake mix and yellow cake mix to a jar.
Place a cupcake liner over the cake mix and add the rainbow sprinkles.
Store in the pantry for up to 3 months.
When ready to eat, remove the lid and cupcake liner with the sprinkles from the jar.
Pour the water into the dry cake mix.
Mix thoroughly, making sure to scrape the dry mix from the bottom of the jar.
Pour the sprinkles into the jar and gently stir to distribute, being careful not to push all of the sprinkles to the bottom.
Microwave for another 40 seconds, until cooked through.
Top with whipped cream and rainbow sprinkles, if desired.
